attributes.action: NO MORE V.P WINGS IN THE UK PRISONS FOR PAEDOS, CHILD KILLERS AND RAPISTS
attributes.additional_details: we MUST protect the REAL vulnerable people in these situations, the VICTIM, not the animals that commit these crimes by putting them on wings to protect them from the general population of the prison, these crimes rates will reduce rapidly if they know there is no protection for them anymore, creating a better safer future in the U.K for all
attributes.background: Stop protecting sentenced paedos,child killers and rapists on V.P(VULNERABLE PRISONERS) wings inside uk prisons there VILE not vulnerable increase there sentence to a minium mandatory of 25yrs and if sentenced they HAVE to be named regardless and no new identitys upon there release

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be an operational decision for prison governors and not one for the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling for new government measures to protect victims of crime if that is something you would like to see happen.
